column5: Hey traveler! This listing is for a spacious 5 bedroom home. Four rooms are equipped with queen sized mattress, plenty of closet space, an wall to wall carpet. There's also a theater room, large backyard with a pool, hot tub, and space to hangout! The house is in a quiet neighborhood and just minutes away from shops, and 15 minutes from Downtown Dallas.
column8: Beautiful Home with tons of Amenities
